channel.title: Posts on David's musings and ramblings.
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on David's musings and ramblings.

item.title: Setting up a space to write some stuff
item.description: I have decided to setup a little space for myself to write down some stuff I might want to refer to at a later time, hoping that it might be helpful for someone also at some point. I have decided to do it with Hugo, so far so good :) Some of the things I’m enjoying: hugo serve that starts the server locally autoreloads when any changes are made (nice) it was simpler to get started than Jekyll
